 </head>
 <body class="locale-en homepage">
  <header class="marquee bg-image lazyload lazyload-in-view homepage-marquee only-marquee">
   <div class="marquee-overlay">
   </div>
   <div class="marquee-inner">
    <div class="marquee-content">
     <h1 class="marquee-logo">

         <path d="M617.576818,128.852179 C614.866818,128.592179 614.120818,122.847179 614.120818,122.847179 C614.120818,122.793179 608.362818,88.615179 608.362818,88.615179 C608.362818,88.654179 607.000818,81.972179 607.000818,81.972179 C605.598818,74.862179 604.141818,67.497179 601.433818,60.728179 C592.582818,40.210179 567.185818,36.837179 548.481818,42.377179 C545.482818,43.288179 542.638818,44.827179 542.638818,44.827179 L542.638818,57.544179 C550.331818,54.207179 557.835818,54.004179 563.905818,56.889179 C571.804818,60.715179 574.032818,70.447179 574.440818,74.478179 C574.440818,74.546179 575.134818,78.984179 575.134818,78.984179 C566.009818,80.357179 554.674818,82.610179 546.315818,88.507179 C536.974818,95.164179 532.058818,105.773179 533.149818,116.855179 C533.488818,128.646179 542.612818,138.081179 551.421818,141.350179 C563.131818,145.490179 579.199818,144.821179 588.759818,133.818179 C588.812818,133.764179 589.929818,132.520179 589.929818,132.520179 L592.636818,135.152179 C599.607818,142.465179 607.245818,142.235179 616.096818,141.975179 L620.793818,141.879179 L620.790818,129.333179 C620.790818,129.333179 617.658818,128.886179 617.576818,128.852179 L617.576818,128.852179 Z M577.443818,94.071179 L583.160818,121.791179 C568.434818,138.772179 544.176818,108.971179 577.443818,94.071179 L577.443818,94.071179 Z" id="Fill-12">
         </path>
         <path d="M499 141.802 529.769 141.802 529.769 8 499 24.474 499 141.802" id="Fill-13">
         </path>
        </g>
       </g>
      </svg>
     </a>
     <div class="nav-swipeable">
      <div class="nav-swipeable-inner">
       <ul class="nav-menu nav-mobile-content nav-primary-menu active">

      <div class="top-pathing-item-wrap">
       <a class="simple-item-title item-title" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Sarah Hyland Has Been Hospitalized " data-vars-ga-position="3" data-vars-ga-total-positions="5" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Top Touts" href="/celebrity/a21777530/sarah-hyland-hospital-swollen-face/">
        Sarah Hyland Has Been Hospitalized
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="simple-item top-pathing-item show-numbers">
      <a class="simple-item-image item-image" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="9 'Daria' Details I'm Praying to See in the Reboot" data-vars-ga-position="4" data-vars-ga-total-positions="5" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Top Touts" href="/culture/a21771708/daria-mtv-reboot-details/">
       <img alt="" class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/daria-blue-1529688085.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=320:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/daria-blue-1529688085.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:* 480w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/daria-blue-1529688085.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=320:* 650w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/daria-blue-1529688085.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:* 768w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/daria-blue-1529688085.jpg?crop=1xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=320:* 980w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
      </a>
      <div class="simple-item-index">
       4
      </div>
      <div class="top-pathing-item-wrap">
       <a class="simple-item-title item-title" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="9 'Daria' Details I'm Praying to See in the Reboot" data-vars-ga-position="4" data-vars-ga-total-positions="5" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Top Touts" href="/culture/a21771708/daria-mtv-reboot-details/">
        9 'Daria' Details I'm Praying to See in the Reboot
       </a>

     <div class="full-item-metadata">
      <a class="item-parent-link full-item-parent-link" href="/culture/">

      </a>

      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="full-item-content">
      <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/culture/a21771708/daria-mtv-reboot-details/">
       9 'Daria' Details I'm Praying to See in the Reboot
      </a>
      <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
       <p>

       </p>

     </a>
     <div class="full-item-metadata">
      <a class="item-parent-link full-item-parent-link" href="/fashion/">
       Fashion
      </a>
      <div class="publish-date full-item-publish-date js-date" data-format="MMM D, YYYY" data-publish-date="2018-06-21T22:14:00Z">
       Jun 21, 2018
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="full-item-content">
      <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/fashion/news/g3017/celebrity-outfit-inspiration-july-4/">
       5 Non-Cheesy July 4th Outfit Ideas From Your Favorite Celebs
      </a>
      <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
       <p>
        Because outfit planning starts now.
       </p>
      </div>
      <!-- shared/byline -->
      <div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
       By
       <a class="byline-name" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Marina Liao" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Byline" href="/author/1642/marina-liao/" itemprop="name" rel="author">
        Marina Liao
       </a>
      </div>
      <!-- / shared/byline -->
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="newsletter list-newsletter">
     <div class="newsletter-outer">

     <div class="full-item-content">
      <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/fashion/a21748218/kylie-jenner-floral-mini-dress/">

      </a>
      <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
       <p>
        This is her signature style.
       </p>
      </div>
      <!-- shared/byline -->
      <div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
       By
       <a class="byline-name" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Marina Liao" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Byline" href="/author/1642/marina-liao/" itemprop="name" rel="author">
        Marina Liao
       </a>
      </div>
      <!-- / shared/byline -->
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="full-item ">
     <a class="full-item-image item-image" href="/politics/a21748515/jacinda-ardern-pregnancy-birth-maternity-leave/">
      <img alt="" class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/jacinda-948219192-1529619525.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=480:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/jacinda-948219192-1529619525.jpg?crop=1.00xw:1.00xh;0,0&amp;resize=768:* 980w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="Jacinda Ardern"/>
     </a>
     <div class="full-item-metadata">
      <a class="item-parent-link full-item-parent-link" href="/politics/">
       Politics
      </a>
      <div class="publish-date full-item-publish-date js-date" data-format="MMM D, YYYY" data-publish-date="2018-06-21T13:22:00Z">
       Jun 21, 2018
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="full-item-content">
      <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/politics/a21748515/jacinda-ardern-pregnancy-birth-maternity-leave/">
       Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern Is the First World Leader to Take Maternity Leave
      </a>
      <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
       <p>
        The New Zealand PM announced the birth of her baby girl on Thursday.
       </p>
      </div>
      <!-- shared/byline -->
      <div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
       By
       <a class="byline-name" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Cady Drell" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Byline" href="/author/219861/Cady-Drell/" itemprop="name" rel="author">
        Cady Drell
       </a>
      </div>
      <!-- / shared/byline -->
     </div>
    </div>
    <div class="full-item ">
     <a class="full-item-image item-image" href="/culture/a19664264/riverdale-season-3-spoilers-rumors-news-cast-date/">
      <img alt="" class="lazyload lazyload-in-view" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/rvd219b-0032b-1529618515.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.756xh;0,0.115xh&amp;resize=480:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/rvd219b-0032b-1529618515.jpg?crop=1.00xw:0.756xh;0,0.115xh&amp;resize=768:* 980w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="Riverdale Season 2"/>
     </a>
     <div class="full-item-metadata">
      <a class="item-parent-link full-item-parent-link" href="/culture/">
       Culture
      </a>
      <div class="publish-date full-item-publish-date js-date" data-format="MMM D, YYYY" data-publish-date="2018-06-21T13:13:00Z">
       Jun 21, 2018
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="full-item-content">
      <a class="full-item-title item-title" href="/culture/a19664264/riverdale-season-3-spoilers-rumors-news-cast-date/">
       We Finally Know When Were Going to Get Our Riverdale' Questions Answered
      </a>
      <div class="full-item-dek item-dek">
       <p>
        There's apparently a major hint in season two that we all missed.
       </p>
      </div>
      <!-- shared/byline -->
      <div class="byline full-item-byline" itemprop="author" itemscope="" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
       By
       <a class="byline-name" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Kayleigh Roberts" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Byline" href="/author/207409/kayleigh-roberts/" itemprop="name" rel="author">
        Kayleigh Roberts
       </a>
       and
       <a class="byline-name" data-vars-ga-call-to-action="Rachel Epstein" data-vars-ga-ux-element="Byline" href="/author/17864/rachel-epstein/" itemprop="name" rel="author">
        Rachel Epstein
       </a>
      </div>
      <!-- / shared/byline -->
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>

        <a href="https://www.hearst.com/newsroom/us-magazines-privacy-notice#_ADDITIONAL_INFO" target="_blank">
         Your California Privacy Rights
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="footer-legal-menu-item nav-item" data-id="3">
        <a href="https://www.hearst.com/newsroom/us-magazines-privacy-notice#_INTEREST_BASED" target="_blank">
         Interest-Based Ads
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="footer-legal-menu-item nav-item" data-id="4">
        <a href="http://www.hearst.com/newsroom/us-magazines-terms-of-use" target="_blank">
         Updated Terms of Use
        </a>
       </li>
       <li class="footer-legal-menu-item nav-item" data-id="5">
        <a href="/sitemap/">
         Site Map
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>
   </footer>
   <!-- / footers/main -->
   <script id="autosuggest-link-template" type="text/template">
    <li>
		<a href="<%= data.searchLink %>" class="search-overlay-autosuggest-link" data-type="<%= data.type %>" >
			<%= data.label.replace( data.term, "<span class=\"search-overlay-autosuggest-link-type\" >" + data.term + "</span>" ) %>
		</a>
	</li>
   </script>
  </div>
  <script id="deferred-css-script-tag">
   ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/marieclaire/assets/css/homepage.b54f78f.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/marieclaire/assets/css/homepage-mobile.bd1711d.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
  </script>
